subject: PDARCH
title: Co-op Fundamentals for Architects
description: This course will explore aspects of career development related to preparing for and being successful in co-op work terms, such as understanding Co-operative Education and Career Action (CECA) policies and procedures, using Waterloo Works, preparing résumés, interviewing effectively, meeting employers' expectations and preparing work-term reports. [Note: This course will be graded on a CR/NCR basis. Offered: F]
